media:group.media:title: What is Theology?
media:group.media:description:
In this video, Kyle helps define what theology is, explains how it is all around us, and talks about why you should care about theology.

Note: It should be "Evagrius of Pontus" not "Ponticus". I will also fix the subscribe animation in the next video.

Recommended Resources:

Peter C. Hodgson and Robert H. King, eds.  Christian Theology: An Introduction to Its Traditions and Tasks. Minneapolis: Fortress Press, 1994. http://amzn.to/2FS6fA0 (affiliate)

Serene Jones and Paul Lakeland, eds.  Constructive Theology: A Contemporary Approach to Classical Themes. Minneapolis: Fortress Press, 2005. http://amzn.to/2Ewlgap (affiliate)

William Placher, ed. Essentials of Christian Theology. Louisville: Westminster John Knox Press, 2003. http://amzn.to/2DuJC6E (affiliate)
